text: The MM/SPQ-2 was an Italian naval radar produced by SMA. It was a multifunction radar performing the functions of surface and low altitude search as well as navigation. The radar equipped many ships of the Italian Navy, including the s, s, s, s and , and, in its upgraded SPQ-2D form, was exported to Canada for the s. It was developed into the MM/SPS-702 and MM/SPS-703. ==References== Category:Military radars of Italy Category:Naval radars Category:Military equipment of Italy
title: MM/SPQ-2
